subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The Japanese boxer Yutaka Niida stopped the challenger José Varela of Venezuela in the sixth round on in Tokyo to defend his W.B.A. minimumweight title. Niida sent Varela to the canvas at 2 minutes 16 seconds of the sixth round for his first knockout in a title bout. Niida, who first claimed the title in 2004, improved to 23-1-3 with nine knockouts. Varela fell to 15-4 with seven knockouts.
